formdata.description: Image file (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP). Creates large + thumb; returns large path/URL.

request.description: Upload image via multipart. Resizes using config imageSizes; stores to S3 or assets/upload. Response returns only the large image path.
Upload image via JSON body. Send "image" or "photo" as base64 (optional data:image/...;base64, prefix). Returns large image path.
